briefTitle: Safety Study of Oxycodone Hydrochloride and Naltrexone Hydrochloride Extended-Release Capsules in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Chronic Noncancer Pain
officialTitle: A Multicenter, 12-month, Open-label, Single-arm, Safety Study Of Oxycodone Hydrochloride And Naltrexone Hydrochloride Extended-release Capsules In Subjects With Moderate To Severe Chronic Noncancer Pain

interventions.name: oxycodone HCl and naltrexone HCl extended-release capsules

arms.label: oxycodone HCl and naltrexone HCl extended-release capsules

summary: The study will provide information to assess the benefits versus risks of extended exposure to oxycodone HCl and naltrexone HCl extended-release capsules in a chronic noncancer pain population.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (AEs) and Adverse Reactions
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline up to end of study (2 weeks post-end of month 12)
